17.3 Load and Prepare Dataset
The dataset can be downloaded as a single 20 megabyte zip ﬁle. A direct download link is
provided blow:
 household power consumption.zip 1
Download the dataset and unzip it into your current working directory. You will now have
the ﬁle household power consumption.txt that is about 127 megabytes in size and contains
all of the observations. We can use the read csv() function to load the data and combine the
